title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Design of a Mobile-Based Elementary Science Learning Material Delivery System

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can independently replicate scientific experiment procedures using smartphone-based learning media
Learners can analyze multimedia materials provided on the mobile platform and accurately explain core concepts with 90% or higher accuracy
Through group collaboration, students can create and present science project reports applying mobile learning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
